quick_actions_contact_us_subtitle: Let us know what we can do for you
panic_messageSet4_text6: DRINK WATER HUNGER IS OFTEN THIRST.
panic_messageSet4_text7: VISUALIZE YOUR SUCCESS MAKE IT REAL.
prePaywall_review4_text: The panic button feature saved me countless times. When cravings hit, the app gives me instant tools to redirect my thoughts. Absolutely life-changing.
notifications_permission_prompt_text: Enabling notifications increase by 63% your chances to resist your sugar cravings. Notifications may include alerts, sounds, and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings.
